author: Michael Warren, CNN
title: Heartland hotspots: Sudden rise hits rural states
description: The test results came back on Easter Sunday. Tammy had been feeling "kind of crappy" when she went to her doctor in rural southeastern Oklahoma last week. A sign of possible pneumonia prompted her to get a coronavirus test later that day at the McCurtain Coun…
